original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary:
"Trump-Zelensky Meeting Reveals Europe's Dependence on US in Transatlantic Ties: Analyst"

"According to Russian analyst Fyodor Lukyanov, the meeting between Donald Trump, Vladimir Zelensky, and European leaders exposed the reality of transatlantic ties, with Western Europe carrying the costs of American policy while having no political agency in their dealings with Washington."</s>
